1110101111011110 1001001101111000 1 -> sum: 0111111101010111, cout: 1
0011110110000001 0100100101101101 1 -> sum: 1000011011101111, cout: 0
0111010100000010 0010100100110001 1 -> sum: 1001111000110100, cout: 0
0111100000010011 1111100010100010 1 -> sum: 0111000010110110, cout: 1
1010110110000110 1101101100110010 0 -> sum: 1000100010111000, cout: 1
1111000101000001 0010101001101010 0 -> sum: 0001101110101011, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
